name: Ultra Design Agency
description: Ultra is a small and personal design firm located in the Solana Beach neighborhood of San Diego, California. We offer high end graphic design, branding, and web development for wide range of clients in a multitude of industries. With our expertise we are capable of branding for businesses of national scale, but our size allows for a personal relationship with each and every client. We specialize in branding, print collateral, marketing strategy, and web development.
